name: Medivh
title: The Last Guardian
description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

abilities.name: Arcane Rift
abilities.description: Launch a rift that deals 200 damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund 50 Mana.

abilities.name: Force of Will
abilities.description: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Portal
abilities.description: Create a set of portals between Medivh and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.

heroics.name: Poly Bomb
heroics.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

heroics.name: Ley Line Seal
heroics.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

original.name: Medivh
original.title: The Last Guardian
original.description: Under the demon lord Sargeras's influence, Medivh opened the Dark Portal and unleashed the Horde upon Azeroth. To atone for this sin, he rallied a new generation of heroes to stand against the Burning Legion. Now, he takes his place amongst legends.
original.shortDescription: A Support who can negate burst damage and allow his allies to teleport.

baseHeroInfo.name: Medivh
baseHeroInfo.title: The Last Guardian
baseHeroInfo.description: Under the demon lord Sargeras's influence, Medivh opened the Dark Portal and unleashed the Horde upon Azeroth. To atone for this sin, he rallied a new generation of heroes to stand against the Burning Legion. Now, he takes his place amongst legends.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Support who can negate burst damage and allow his allies to teleport.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

trait.name: Raven Form
trait.description: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.

skins.name: The Last Guardian
skins.description: Under the demon lord Sargeras's influence, Medivh opened the Dark Portal and unleashed the Horde upon Azeroth. To atone for this sin, he rallied a new generation of heroes to stand against the Burning Legion. Now, he takes his place amongst legends.

skins.name: Magus Medivh
skins.description: For ages, Atiesh has been passed down from one Guardian of Tirisfal to the next. Medivh has attuned himself to Atiesh like none before him, and the line between Greatstaff and Guardian has begun to blur.

skins.name: Knight Owl Medivh
skins.description: The Prophets of Kharazania forsaw the Eternal Empire's invasion, but their warning came too late. Medivh, the last Knight Owl, has sworn to prevent the Earth from suffering a similar fate.
